The candidate, Mostafa Abuzahra, presents a well-rounded profile with a strong academic background in Computer Science from the German International University. He has demonstrated a keen interest in AI, machine learning, cloud computing, and full-stack development. His experience spans multiple roles, including internships at Mideast Communication Systems and National Bank of Kuwait, as well as a full-time position at AutoPulse.
